com.example.painintheass.Graphics.Views

Class SkillsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.example.painintheass.Graphics.Views.SkillsView

  • public class SkillsView
extends View
    The view responsible for displaying the skills menu and relaying events to the UI.

        protected void onDraw(Canvas c)
